page.title: 15LOCAL NEWS ITEMS (CONT)
page.content: Derwent has averaged 364 salmon per year (i.e.,1 per day!).This makes the Derwent the most heavily poached river in Britain. LEYLAND BUSES-the Leyland bus plant in Workington has recently clinched a vital Â£7.5 million order. The local plant and it's sister plant in Lowestoft will supply the National Bus Company with 170 new buses and coaches, comprising 133 Tiger single deckers and 41 double deckers. NUCLEAR CONCERN-local beaches and villages could be contaminated by escaping nuclear waste from the Sellafield Atomic Energy instalations 20 miles away. Many local and National pressure groups are considering taking the government to court for alleged negligence. Local feeling runs very high.B.N.F.L.deny the allegations.
